dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.customer.cust.CustomerCreditProfile
dataStructure.description:
An outline of a Customer's credit worthiness.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: CustomerCreditProfile

child.name: iD
child.description:
The identifier of the credit profile.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: iD

child.name: creditProfileDate
child.description:
The date the profile was established.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: creditProfileDate

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period for which the profile is valid.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor

child.name: creditRiskRating
child.description:
This is an integer whose value is used to rate the risk of this Customer paying late or defaulting versus paying on time.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: creditRiskRating

child.name: creditScore
child.description:
A measure of a person?s or organization?s creditworthiness calculated on the basis of a combination of factors such as their income and credit history.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: creditScore

child.name: custCreditProfileReference
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association CustCreditProfileIncludes

This association end is optional
child.label: custCreditProfileReference

child.name: customer
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association CustomerStabilityMeasuredBy

This association end is optional
child.label: customer
